00027 #include "lpc17xx_i2c.h"
00028 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"

00032 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00038 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS *************************/
00040 #define USEDI2CDEV      0
00041 
00042 /* Definition of internal register of SC16IS750/760 */
00043 #define IODIR           0x0A
00044 #define IOSTATE         0x0B
00045 #define IOCON           0x0E
00046 #define SLVADDR         (0x90>>1)
00047 #define REGS_ADDR(n) (n<<3)
00048 
00049 #if (USEDI2CDEV == 0)
00050 #define I2CDEV LPC_I2C0
00051 #elif (USEDI2CDEV == 2)
00052 #define I2CDEV LPC_I2C2
00053 #else
00054 #error "I2C device not defined!"
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00058 uint8_t menu1[] =
00059 "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00060 "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00061 "I2C demo \n\r"
00062 "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00063 "\t - Core: ARM Cortex-M3 \n\r"
00064 "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115.2 kbps \n\r"
00065 " An example of I2C using polling mode to test the I2C driver \n\r"
00066 " Using I2C at mode I2C master/8bit on LPC1766 to communicate with \n\r"
00067 " SC16IS750/760 Demo Board \n\r"
00068 " Press '1' to turn ON, '2' to turn OFF LEDs \n\r"
00069 "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00070 uint8_t menu2[] = "Demo terminated! \n\r";
00071 
00072 /* Define array data with match data to set internal register value of SC16IS740/750/760 */
00073 uint8_t iocon_cfg[2] = {REGS_ADDR(IOCON), 0x00};
00074 uint8_t iodir_cfg[2] = {REGS_ADDR(IODIR), 0xFF};
00075 uint8_t iostate_cfg_0[2] = {REGS_ADDR(IOSTATE), 0x00};
00076 uint8_t iostate_cfg_1[2] = {REGS_ADDR(IOSTATE), 0xFF};

00081 void Error_Loop(uint32_t ErrorCode);

00114 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00115 /*********************************************************************/
00120 int c_entry(void)
00121 {
00122         uint8_t tmpchar[2] = {0, 0};
00123         __IO FlagStatus exitflag;
00124         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00125         I2C_M_SETUP_Type transferCfg;
00126         uint8_t SC16IS_RegStat;
00127 
00128         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00129          * – 115200bps
00130          * – 8 data bit
00131          * – No parity
00132          * – 1 stop bit
00133          * – No flow control
00134          */
00135         debug_frmwrk_init();
00136 
00137         // print welcome screen
00138         print_menu();
00139 
00140         /*
00141          * Init I2C pin connect
00142          */
00143         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00144         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00145 #if (USEDI2CDEV == 0)
00146         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00147         PinCfg.Pinnum = 27;
00148         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00149         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00150         PinCfg.Pinnum = 28;
00151         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00152 #elif (USEDI2CDEV == 2)
00153         PinCfg.Funcnum = 2;
00154         PinCfg.Pinnum = 10;
00155         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00156         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00157         PinCfg.Pinnum = 11;
00158         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00159 #endif
00160 
00161         /* I2C block ------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00162         // Initialize I2C peripheral
00163         I2C_Init(I2CDEV, 100000);
00164 
00165         /* Enable I2C1 operation */
00166         I2C_Cmd(I2CDEV, ENABLE);
00167 
00168         /* Configure SC16IS750 ---------------------------------------------------------- */
00169         /* First, send some command to reset SC16IS740 chip via I2C bus interface */
00170         transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00171         transferCfg.tx_data = (uint8_t *)iocon_cfg;
00172         transferCfg.tx_length = sizeof(iocon_cfg);
00173         transferCfg.rx_data = NULL;
00174         transferCfg.rx_length = 0;
00175         transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00176         if (I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_POLLING) \
00177                         == ERROR){
00178                 Error_Loop(transferCfg.status);
00179         }
00180 
00181         transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00182         transferCfg.tx_data = (uint8_t *)iodir_cfg;
00183         transferCfg.tx_length = sizeof(iodir_cfg);
00184         transferCfg.rx_data = NULL;
00185         transferCfg.rx_length = 0;
00186         transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00187         if (I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_POLLING) \
00188                         == ERROR){
00189                 Error_Loop(transferCfg.status);
00190         }
00191 
00192         transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00193         transferCfg.tx_data = (uint8_t *)iostate_cfg_0;
00194         transferCfg.tx_length = sizeof(iostate_cfg_0);
00195         transferCfg.rx_data = NULL;
00196         transferCfg.rx_length = 0;
00197         transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00198         if (I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_POLLING) \
00199                         == ERROR){
00200                 Error_Loop(transferCfg.status);
00201         }
00202 
00203 
00204         /* Validate value of SC16IS750 register ------------------------------------------ */
00205         /* This section will dump out value of register that set through I2C bus */
00206 
00207         transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00208         transferCfg.tx_data = (uint8_t *)iocon_cfg;
00209         transferCfg.tx_length = 1;
00210         transferCfg.rx_data = (uint8_t *)&SC16IS_RegStat;
00211         transferCfg.rx_length = 1;
00212         transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00213         if (I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_POLLING) \
00214                         == ERROR){
00215                 Error_Loop(transferCfg.status);
00216         }
00217 
00218         transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00219         transferCfg.tx_data = (uint8_t *)iodir_cfg;
00220         transferCfg.tx_length = 1;
00221         transferCfg.rx_data = (uint8_t *)&SC16IS_RegStat;
00222         transferCfg.rx_length = 1;
00223         transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00224         if (I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_POLLING) \
00225                         == ERROR){
00226                 Error_Loop(transferCfg.status);
00227         }
00228 
00229         transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00230         transferCfg.tx_data = (uint8_t *)iostate_cfg_0;
00231         transferCfg.tx_length = 1;
00232         transferCfg.rx_data = (uint8_t *)&SC16IS_RegStat;
00233         transferCfg.rx_length = 1;
00234         transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00235         if (I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_POLLING) \
00236                         == ERROR){
00237                 Error_Loop(transferCfg.status);
00238         }
00239 
00240         // Reset exit flag
00241         exitflag = RESET;
00242 
00243     /* Read some data from the buffer */
00244     while (exitflag == RESET){
00245 
00246         while((tmpchar[0] = _DG) == 0);
00247 
00248         if (tmpchar[0] == 27){
00249                         /* ESC key, set exit flag */
00250                         _DBG_(menu2);
00251                         exitflag = SET;
00252                 }
00253                 else if (tmpchar[0] == 'r'){
00254                         print_menu();
00255                 }
00256                 else{
00257                         if (tmpchar[0] == '1'){
00258                                 // LEDs are ON now...
00259                                 transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00260                                 transferCfg.tx_data = (uint8_t *)iostate_cfg_0;
00261                                 transferCfg.tx_length = sizeof(iostate_cfg_0);
00262                                 transferCfg.rx_data = NULL;
00263                                 transferCfg.rx_length = 0;
00264                                 transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00265                                 if (I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_POLLING) \
00266                                                 == ERROR){
00267                                         Error_Loop(transferCfg.status);
00268                                 }
00269                         }
00270                         else if (tmpchar[0] == '2')
00271                         {
00272                                 // LEDs are OFF now...
00273                                 transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00274                                 transferCfg.tx_data = (uint8_t *)iostate_cfg_1;
00275                                 transferCfg.tx_length = sizeof(iostate_cfg_1);
00276                                 transferCfg.rx_data = NULL;
00277                                 transferCfg.rx_length = 0;
00278                                 transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00279                                 if (I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_POLLING) \
00280                                                 == ERROR){
00281                                         Error_Loop(transferCfg.status);
00282                                 }
00283                         }
00284                         /* Then Echo it back */
00285                         _DBG_(tmpchar);
00286                 }
00287     }
00288 
00289     // wait for current transmission complete - THR must be empty
00290     while (UART_CheckBusy(LPC_UART0)==SET);
00291 
00292     // DeInitialize UART0 peripheral
00293     UART_DeInit(LPC_UART0);
00294     I2C_DeInit(I2CDEV);
00295     /* Loop forever */
00296     while(1);
00297     return 1;
00298 }
00299 
00300 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00301    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00302    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00303    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00304    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00305 int main(void)
00306 {
00307     return c_entry();
00308 }
